trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle routed event that occur when a tooltip opens and closes.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que irá processar o evento encaminhado que ocorrem quando uma descrição abre e fecha.

trans-unit.source: When a tooltip opens and closes, this delegate provides an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma descrição abre e fecha, este delegado fornece um processador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The element that specifies the tooltip inherits from either <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: O elemento que especifica a descrição herda de um <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>ou <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, open and close events exist on both of these classes.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, os eventos de abrir e fechar existem ambas estas classes.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events that use this event handler.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte lista os eventos que utilizam este processador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: |Events that occur when a tooltip opens|Events that occur when a tooltip closes| |--------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>| These events are registered by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> class using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent> fields, but the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> class does not expose these events on itself (attached or otherwise).
trans-unit.target: | Eventos que ocorrem quando abre uma descrição | Eventos que ocorrem quando fecha uma descrição | |--------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>| Estes eventos são registados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>classe utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent>campos, mas o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>classe não expõe estes eventos em si próprio (ligado ou outros).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> classes both implement the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> and expose this event by defining the events in the previous table, copying the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> fields to create new routed event identifiers that exist on the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>classes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>implementam classes de ambos os o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>e expor este evento, definindo os eventos na tabela anterior, copiar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>campos para criar um novo encaminhados identificadores de evento que existe a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>classes.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: If the tooltip is defined as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> class are also raised when a tooltip opens and closes.
trans-unit.target: Se a descrição está definida como um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>objeto, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed>eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>classe também são gerados quando a descrição abre e fecha.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>
